content.detailedDescription: My wife and i were leaving a dinner party at about 8:00 pm on january 18. i left first and was waiting for her out in the parking lot. i was looking at the night sky above me. it was dark and i could see a lot of stars. i noticed one star that was moving. it was zig-zagging around the sky. it would move in one direction, then another, then another. almost as if it was searching for something. my wife came out to the parking lot and i asked her if she saw what i saw. she noticed it too. we both noticed another object near the first. they were both moving erratically. i was thinking maybe atmospheric effects but the movements were really pronounced and seemed intentional. we observed them for five minutes then got in the car and drove home. it was nothing spectacular. they just looked like white stars.  if they were closer we might have been more interested but they were so far away. this wasn't the first sighting i've experienced so it explains my lack of excitement.
content.summary: Noticed two star-like objects zig-zagging above me in the sky

content.detailedDescription: Around 815pm last nite 2/16/14 i had just started shift at work. i work alone and outside, i was standing near valleyview and hope st. city of cypress ca. in orange county. i happend to look south and noticed a brilliant amber light heading north. i first thought it was a airplane but quickly realized this was no airplane or anything eles im familiar with. just the color was so intense!! it wasn't just a light but an object of some type circular. i pulled my cell out to snap a photo but hit video thinking its better, right then i realized there was another exactly the same behind it ! and another, around 8. a straight line back to back maybe half mile apart.My camara stopped recording so i hit record again! the first object  ascended and headed nw pass the clounds then went dim then vanished! ! they all headed the same path and did the exact same thing except the last. the last ascended further back and did not head nw!! i went to review my videos and just like in the movies something went wrong!! my cell stopped twice recording,  think everytime i hit record it earased the previous! ! new phone, should have used photo! i cant relate in words how upset i am!! this is real and everything is true!! i am a clear headed person. ( except when using cell cam). i am not saying they were aliens!! but i can say no doubt they were not lanterns, balloons,  or everyday aircrafts.  by the way completely silent. turned news on right away and nothing at all! nothing on internet so far. if anyone saw them or know what they were i really would like to know thank you!!
content.summary: 8 amber glowing objects oc ca cypress area..

content.detailedDescription: Object appeared to be of a modified boomerang, almost a "t" shape  it was well above 20,000 ft when i first noticed it. it made strange movements unluke a helicopte  or airplane.  at the altitude it was flying it moved across my field of vision faster than aircraft on approach to phx. at about 4,000 ft. i would estumate top speed to be mach1+ after about 90 min. it started ascending at a rapid rate stopping at 1 to 2 min intervals and moving laterally in weird arcs. finally about 10:25pm mst it became to high to see.  through binoculars i could see a bright white object with a green glow throughout its perimeter.  i called the local sherrif's office at 8:35pm . they didn't show. it was quite a spectacle and very entertaining.  i was sitting in my hot tub gazing at the stars when i first saw it.  at first it was in the eastern sky it moved in an odd pattern to the west so fr that i had to go to my front yard to continue watching it. i don't believe in little green men from outer spacebut what  i saw tonight has me pondering life elswhere in the universe.  this object defied all laws of physics and aerodynamics. i tried taking photos but m camera does not have enough resolution.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Appeared at 8:30 pm mst darted around sky for 90 min then began to scend

content.detailedDescription:
Update/pics: ufo over morrison, co
photos that show object taken inside car with phone camera and others to show landing spot and flight direction
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Update/pics: ufo over morrison, co feb-15-2014

content.detailedDescription: Too much to describe in an entry, but basically i was driving home from work towards the east hills of milpitas, ca on calavaras rd.  i turned south onto piedmont rd and headed south, when i noticed 3 separate lights hovering over the mountain range.  i have seen helicopters positioned there sometimes to watch the traffic along i-680.  this time however was different.  as obeserved while driving, the northern most light was colored yellow, middle green, and southern most red.  there was one more light to the west, which i believed was a helicopter with red flashing strobe lights.  as i traveled further into now san jose, i realized that the lights were now moving.  i stopped to get gas at a shell station along the way and stepped away from the care momentarily to see if the lights were still moving.  they were, but slowly.  after getting gas i drove up suncrest road which goes up the nearby foothill.  this is when things became interesting.  as i drove further up the hill i saw that the one green light was headed in the same direction as my car, but very slowly, with now sound (not a helicopter).  i managed to luck out by being in a relatively dark area - but with homes around.  i headed down boulder rd and parked the car (did not get out).  this road is essentially an overlook where i can see all of silicon valley.  i looked up an was lucky to see the green lighted object - which i realized was clearly now a triangular shaped craft.  each point of the triangle had a yellow navigation light.  but in the middle of the triangle was another triangle - a lighted red triangle.  the light was also strange looking.  imagine a huge computer monitor with the screen red and with an occassional video noise - sort of like interference on a screen.  i know this sounds strange.  as i was watching this thing i also noticed that it was ascending up into the clouds.  it took off.  at the same time we noticed two other lights one with red strobes and the other yellow moving southward towards the evergreen district of san jose.  from my vantage point i could see everything.  the yellow light moved to a certain location and remained parked over the area for over an hour.  the light then became bright - very bright, and changing colors, white, red, green, blue, sometimes changing very rapidly.  i arrived back at my house had dinner then told the family my experience.  after dinner, i noticed that the one light was still visible from my office window.  this is the extent of this report.  as i am writing this my daughters are telling me that the light is actually moving around.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Ufo cluster east hills of san jose, ca

content.detailedDescription: I was turning onto 42 from lebanon and i notice a very bright light straight down the road, i figured it was probably an airplane going to land at one of the near airfields because i saw some sort of blinking lights, i keep driving towards it heading towards waynesville down 42 and i notice that it hasn't moved at all as i drove down about 3-4 miles and as i'm about to downtown waynesville i notice it's about a mile away floating about 4/5,000 above the bikepath that runs across the street in corwin (you can google it). this is when i can see 2/3 very noticeable lights on the front along with a semi-steady green on my view of the back of it (the front tip and i were heading in opposite directions). through the middle of waynesville i'm stopped at a red light and i'm watching it and it starts to slowly (20-30) move heading south, this is when i got a clear view of the outline of a dark black/silver triangle shape, the people behind me in traffic were watching it too. as i'm driving past it i open my sunroof to get a better view and it looked as if it were slowly ascending. once i passed it and went to centerville road i didn't see it again. one of my friends had coincidentally uploaded a picture of a nearly identical looking triangle ufo in our area about half a year ago (i'll attach the picture)
content.summary: Distinct iron looking triangle with 2/3 white lights with a 30ish sec delay green light

content.detailedDescription: I walked outside to go to my truck for something. when i noticed something. unusual above the field and tree line at the end of my road. the object was hovering over the tree line with light similar to a plane,  but planes don't hover. i lost the object behind the trees for a moment when i decided it was a good time to bring items from my truck inside, after placing them on the floor i went back outside this is when it started accenting upward slowly like a leaf falling but this thing was traveling up sometimes zig zagging back and forth as it ascended. i hollered at my wife to come check it out and she witnessed it traveling upward in a zig zag fashion. it finally disappeared behind a cloud, my wife went back inside i looked upward hoping to see it come out the cloud. i did not witness it come out of the cloud but when turning around on the porch to go inside i saw an identical object in the sky to the north west ascending in the same leaf like manner all spanning about 10 minutes  as far as how i felt or reactions to the object, nothing really because this is only one that i have reported but have seen many maybe i was a little excited to see on again  i would also like to add there. where  planes in the sky also this object was much larger than commercial plane
content.summary: The object was hovering over tree line then it kinda floated up in the sky like a leaf would but also did some zig zagging before floating into the clouds and disappearing then i looked north west and saw another object ascending upward in the same way

content.detailedDescription: My dad was taking out the trash, and it was already dark outside. dad stopped to look at the stars, when he noticed 3 red blinking lights that were passing right above the house in a uniform triangle formation. dad said he thought it was 3 separate planes at first, but they stayed in formation and were not making any noise. he ran in the house and called me to come see. i saw the 3 blinking lights, still in the uniform triangle formation. they looked pretty low, lower than a plane would be flying. plus, they made no sound. they were moving very slowly away from our house, and even appeared to hover in place for a short time.  then they continued on its slow way across the sky. as they moved away, they ended up looking more like a straight line. they started out heading in a sort of north east direction, then turned and started heading sort of south east. we were able to see them until they went behind some trees. the whole incident lasted approximately 5 minutes.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: 3 red blinking lights in uniform triangle formation. went right over our house, hovered a little, then took off slowly.  no noise made

content.detailedDescription: I'll talk more latter
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: I saw two fireballs that i thought were meters, but the second one stoped in a little puff of smoke then slowly started moving northwest

content.detailedDescription:
Port monmouth rd , port monmouth new jersey

very bright lights

i thought it was not a plane for sure, but nothing like i ever seen before.

it was a bright triangular outline of lights with a bright light on top of it. stood still in the air until i took a picture,then it's proceeded to move in the direction i was in.

very scared, shaky could not get a good picture because i was shaking, and hyperventilating.

i drove home to get my dad,and brother went back to location object was gone.
content.summary: I was driving and seen bright light i stopped to take a picture then it moved towards me when i returned 2 minutes later it was gone.

content.detailedDescription:
I saw two of these and have pictures of both. one was on 02/15/14 @ approximately 22:00 pm, the second one (which is the one i am reporting) was seen the next night at approximately 16:30 pm. for the first one i was with my girlfriend parked (illegally) at the mullholland overpass. we noticed a white glowing object hovering in the sky. it was extremely bright so we thought it was an airplane coming our way. then we thought it was a tower, until we realized it was hovering over the san fernando valley. it moved closer to our direction and i began snapping pictures. the pictures show a white-ish orb with strange patterns and a blueish aura. it kept appearing as if it were two objects and than a whole again. when i went to take a video it shot upwards into the sky and the light disappeared simultaneously. 

the second one i saw the next night as i left my home in northridge on my way to west hollywood. i was driving north towards parthenia and noticed a very bright orange spherical object in the sky that was moving. it was not emitting much light but it was very bright nonetheless. i parked my car in the middle of the street. my first impression was that it might have been some kind of lantern. then it started to pulsate between bright orange and bright white. i immediately started snapping pictures and a video. once again it appeared as if it may have been two objects that kept separating and re joining. the pictures make it look as if it was doing quick turns but that very well could have been exposure. a lady asked me to move my car because i was blocking her driveway. when i moved it the object shot off at an almost 90o angle westbound and i lost sight of it.

the first two pictures are from the first night. the next three are from the second night. 

there were no sounds or light being emitted from either event. 

for more pictures and the video (which is very indicative of the pulsing) and/or info please contact me. i am curious to know what people think this may be.
content.summary: Pulsating white and orange orb took a straight path than drastically cfhanged directions.

content.detailedDescription: I was bringing some shovels inside.I looked up in the sky and i thought i saw a airplane. it was flying around wildly. it looked like it was kind of rocket shape with metal arms coming off the sides. i ran around my house trying to get a better look, while i was running i lost sight of it. when i got around to my driveway it was gone.
content.summary: The ufo was creepy

content.detailedDescription: I woke up for no apparent reason around 2:50am. grabbed a cigarette and walked over to the door. as i looked out the small window on my door i noticed a large orange-ish yellow light descending from the sky. if i had to guess it was probably goin about 25 or 30 miles an hour. it was strange to me because it wasnt flickering like fire does. it never faded and seemed to be descending almost straight down. unlike the usual slant of air crafts and shooting stars. honestly it made my stomach turn because it was so close to my neighborhood. i refused to go outside and couldnt go back to sleep. i spent the rest of the night lookin out windows. it didnt last long enough to capture on film. :(
content.summary: Looked out front door window when a light caught my eye. at first i thought it was a shooting star but it descended unusually slowly. watched it till it disappeared behind trees. also it wasnt a  white light it was orange-ish and stayed consistent.

content.detailedDescription: i was driving home heading east down warwick ave. i notices lights over the feild, at first i was holy crap is a plane about to crash, but then as i got closer i realised it wasnt moving, and slowed down trying to figure out what i was looking at. i came to a complete stop and i was staring right at a large ship, i knew this was no plane or blimp or anything ive seen in my life. it was so shiney like fresh polished crome and was triangular and had a smoth curve on the top that was shiney but very dark like black. there were red lighs that stayed on and white lights that were so ultra white on the sides,it seemed like it only illuminated the craft, nothing around it was illuminated, and the relection from the white like pulsated off the craft as well as green lights that did the same but at the bottom. when i was further up the road the lights seemed to span out in the air, when i was stopped it was just the craft pulsating, there was no noise at all. at first i was confused and when it sunk in what it wasi was in awe then felt very uneasy, i got nervous. its a very dark road and i saw headlights in both directions so keeping my eye on it constantly looking back i made u turn to go back and tape it, i looked away for a few seconds to make the turn and it vanish, i felt alittle scared. i drove all the wau back down the road very slowly there was nothing in the feild or in the sky, not even a light in the distance, there were two people who were walking down the road who were now running. i was completely freaked out at this point and turned around and went back down the road again to go home, still not a thing in sight. there were 2 people walking atleast 3 other cars passed theres houses on the road and also a high school, i hope more witnesses come forward, it was truley an experience to be so close and get such a good look, i have goose bumps writing this
content.summary: Driving east i saw it over a feild no noise, made u turn at end of road and it vanished

content.detailedDescription: My friend and i had been in northrichland hills durung thweekend of 2-14-2014-2-16-2014 we had witnessed orbs triangle shaped crafts hover crafts the works. i was already very upset at what i had seen witnessed and videoed. we were speaking of the vents and he was telling me to just get some rest i would feel better the next day. then out of the side of my eye i caught something glowing so i turned to look up and it looked like it could have been a kids flying toy except it moved very intelligently i came right over me no sound at all and stopped. i ran towaerdthe front door in a panic and turned around it was still there i paused for a moment staring at it as it stared t me then it truned and flew off in a ne direction. it wasn't until then i noticed that everything got quitet it was like the whole sky which had had planes and helicopters and people and kids everything got real quiet. i felt like i was the only one who saw this because of my prior weekends' events
content.summary: I was on cell phone speaking with a friend about an expirience the night before. an orange light caught my eye so i turned seand looked up. there was somthing flying very low with two orange glowing lights one on either side of it. it flew over me paused

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving my tractor trailer north on us15, approximately 4-5 miles south of the intersection of pa44. straight above the susquehanna river, to my northeast, also, in the direction of watsontown, pa, i saw two bright white lights. they were probably about 1.5-2 miles away when i first saw them. maybe even slightly farther. i thought it was an aircraft that had taken off from montoursville regional airport, heading south. but as i drove further, i realized the lights were not moving. i would describe them as very bright white, large-looking headlights. they appeared to be pointing towards the river, as a beam projected from them straight down. i would guess the beam only projected about 25-40 from the craft, which was around 600-800 feet above the river. the entire duration of seeing it was probably about 3-4 minutes or so. i slowed my speed from 55-60 to low 40s once i realized the object was not moving. the truck seemed to drive itself as i got "lost" watching this. this may sound odd, but i had an overwhelming feeling that "nothing was going on". that's the best way i can describe how i felt. 
there was nowhere for me to pull my truck over until a mile or so down the road, where i know of a small diesel station where i have been before. in hindsight, i regret not pulling into the shoulder to film it. i was able to capture a 20 second iphone5 video of it. the video is shaky because i was still driving, and using elbows to steer. the object appears to be moving because the phone is bouncing everywhere. the object was definitely not moving though. when i pulled into the diesel station, trees and a ridge blocked any view i could have had. 
i also pinned on an iphone map where the object was. it is the purple pin, not the red pin. red pin denotes the town of dewart, pa, which i simply searched as a starting place to pinpoint location. i am born and raised about 15 miles from this location, i drive the roads often, and am very literate with maps.  the purple pin is an accurate location. 
before i filmed, i zoomed iphones video camera because with no zoom it probably would not not have picked up the lights. although the zoom does increase blurriness, it was necessary here.
content.summary: 2 bright white lights with beams shining down to susquehanna river. small flashing red light too.

content.detailedDescription:
We were going to go for a hike in the dark until i seen lights in the forest so we got together in one car and looking south eastern i seen a meteor streak across the sky so i started looking more and i seen a red light with a red light blinking with it floating from the top of the tower just as high also.  it floated our direction so we left 3 witnessed this floating at us we came back to the other car to drop off our two friends when we noticed a light south east a glowing yellow amber color morphing into multiple pairs of lights to 3-4 floating north along the road we were traveling.  
  we made it to an intersection south of brandon south dakota the park is called gichi manitoba.  the light that followed us ended up traveling north and stopping when we noticed a few lights in the sky hovering north of us.  they were spread out at least 1/4 mile of eachother about a 1 mile away or less.  we paid attention to one in front of us above the road when a light came out of it and made a zig zag to the right and down and eventually fell to the ground and disappeared behind trees. as we traveled west the lights stayed hovering in one position for about 10 minutes eventually the lights faded until the one that had another light come out of it.  it appeared that it was wide and had three lights.  most were 2 lights bright white or yellow there was also airplanes in the area.
content.summary: Seen multiple ufos in one night

content.altitude: Treetop, 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: I got up at 5am and was getting back in bed when somthing told me to look outside so i went to look out my back door and thats when i noticed the ufo it flashed like it knew i was watching it, like it was waiting for me! it then slowly started to move south and sparkle over my house so i went out on my front porch with my camera that wouldn't turn on "full battery" and then the ufo stopped hoverd and then went south east and quickly descended over some trees i then noticed another flash but it looked more like a search light that spun around real fast and then the craft and light disappeared. this is not my first ufo sighting but the 3rd above my house. the other 2 sightings i didn't report but i did capture the craft on video on dec,31,2013 the video can be found on youtube under the username xezgamerx the video is titled "2014 new years ufo gresham oregon" and is also featured on episode 93 of ufo planet. eventually i plan to report it. thank you.
content.summary: I got up at 5am somthing told me to go look outside so i did and then...

content.detailedDescription: Out side my apt smokeing seen it to my left bight light thought it was a plane at first then it did not move then i saw a white bilkging light underneth it randomly wacthed it till sun came up cant see it anymore 7;25 am gone this is my 7th ufo siting something needs to be done about this discloser from the u.S. goverment needs to happen  im tied of people thinking im crazy its just not fare ,sorry about missspelled words
content.summary: Star like bliking white light randomly underneth it

content.detailedDescription: On may 21 i believe the year was 2008 i was with my parent and family as we were celebrating mother's day. we were all inside the house but it was a hot  beautiful day out, not a cloud visible in an absolute clear blue sky and my room mate was sitting on our balcony. we live in a two family colonial house in the bronx.  i came out to have a few words with my roommate and noticed she was a little upset about a fight she just had. as i finished the conversation i glanced up to see the beautiful sky when i noticed there was two metallic discs reflecting no light but were solid and not moving but hovering and making no sound. then more of them just seem to appear in small groups but in kind of loose formations. then more and more began to appear three, then four, then five at a time and began filling up the sky. before i knew it there almost hundreds of them. all identical, no movement but hovering almost fixed in the sky and making no sound. the only thing about them is that some of there seem to be appearing and disappearing and appearing again as if flickering like if whatever device was cloaking them was malfunctioning.  i asked my roommate if she saw what i was seeing and she did but had no comment about it, i alerted my aunt who was visiting although seemingly uninterested did confess that she did see what i was seeing. my aunt and room mate left the balcony but i stayed behind for what seem like an hour wishing i had a camera or something to record what i was seeing but i didn't have anything available. some years ago when i met my fiance she too said she saw the same thing from her apartment in new jersey just across the hudson river during that same year. i stayed for an hour watching but then went back inside the house not ever knowing what happened next. i don't remember if i told anyone else about it as it was mother's day and i didn't want to be ridiculed so i kept it a secret up till now..And by the way this was not my first ufo sighting and its very strange that my other sighting was also on a day where my home was full of relatives who were eyewitnesses and was a day of festivities or holiday. but that is another account that i can describe in detail for those willing to listen,,   thank you for listening....
content.summary: Dozens of large metallic discs which appeared as if out of nowhere

content.detailedDescription: I was returning from regularly traveled (at least 1x a month for the last 15 years) 4 hour (round trip) car trip when i felt suddenly ill so i stopped at the location to get out of the vehicle to get some fresh air. while stopped, i decided to make some long exposure photos of the mostly clear night sky over the delta.(i'm a semi-profession photographer). i took photos for approximately one hour that seemed completely uneventful. however, when i arrived at home i was shocked when i realized it was much later than i thought and i can not account for at least one and a half hours of time. it was my perception that i drove straight through, stopped for approximately 1 hour and then drove the remaining 45 minutes straight through after the stop to my home. however, the total time of the trip amounted to closer to 7 hours than 5 (4hrs plus the hour stop over). approximately a week later i reviewed the photos and i observed some strange effects and lighting but i couldn't make a determination to the source. i checked over my equipment to ensure there wasn't an equipment problem and i found no equipment issues at all. a few weeks later i returned to the photographs to begin further processing and editing when by chance/accident i increased the exposure on a photo intended for discard due to underexposure. the increased exposure revealed what appears to be a craft with 4 lights. upon this discovery i increased the exposure on the other photos that where inexplicably underexposed and discovered several more objects. i did not hear or observe any of these objects at the time despite the apparent brightness of the lights and having my camera focused directly in their direction. these newly discovered objects put the original anomalous effects into a different context so i am including those photos as well.  the first 4 photos are the 2 originally observed (on first photo review) anomalies each with a corresponding cropped close up version. the next 2 photos include one original 'out of camera' photo with anomalous 'orange ring' object and it's corresponding cropped to close up version. the next 2 photos are of the exposure adjusted version of the first under exposed photo that revealed an object upon accidental exposure adjustment and it's corresponding cropped to close up version. the last 2 photos are of the exposure adjusted version and the corresponding cropped to close up version of the second photo containing anomalous objects discovered upon adjusting the exposure of the underexposed original version.  also note that all the photos where taken using a tripod and the dslr i was using was set up for manual control for the specific circumstances under which i was shooting, many/most shots exposed properly and i've been unable to find an explanation for why some photos, only the ones with anomalies, seem to indicate a complete disregard for the control settings of the camera.
content.summary: Multiple objects, none were visible but revealed on photographs

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting in my car after just getting in it. i was admiring the long white tails that the planes were leaving behind them. than i saw this very small object round and silver shining bright appear make a l shape turn. i looked away just for a moment as i was also telling my wife who i was on the phone with already, and when i looked up. it was gone, but i knew that i had seen what i saw for sure. i love coast to coast am and i just cant believe it. it was so far away, but it looked just like what i have seen online many times... wow that is my second event as i was in phoenix arizona with the big triangle ufo sighting in the late 90's! this was very different than that as this was much further away, during the daylight and very small. oh and it left no streaks like the jet were.  i saw tonights event in frederick maryland as that is were i work. i wonder if anyone else saw it?
content.summary: I looked up saw object 2 miles away make l shape turn than disappear once i looked away and back

content.detailedDescription: As i was walking home from getting some fuel for heat, i just had the feeling to look up at the night sky. i looked around and then i spotted it. i knew what it was as soon as i saw it. it was moving in a sw direction. it was slowly moving, probally no more than 50 mph. i was basicly spell bond at the sight of it. i did very faintly see something eject from the craft, some type of orb, bout size of a very faint star. i finally lost sight of the craft when it went beyond the tree line of my view.
content.summary: Had 11 red and blue lights in total, to far away to see any details.

content.detailedDescription: My husband and i were walking downtown gainesville at 10pm on feb 15 2014. saw 5 red starlike lights moving in formation to the east, from north to south. they started to disappear one by one at a specific point  in the sky, then another appeared to the north and followed the rest until all disappeared. there were no trees or buildings blocking the view and no clouds at all. they just blinked out one by one. we were completely awestruck and confused. not fearful but definitely convinced it was not anything mundane... we thought they were planes until the formation eas held perfectly and they started to disappear.
content.summary: 5 red lights moving in formation, disappeared 1 by 1. then a sixth moving the same. then gone.

content.detailedDescription: a yellow light, to bright, and seemingly too low, in the sky, and seemingly too large to be a  star, i found very curious, and what attracted me to it even more was that there was a white blinking light, and a red one too, that blinked nearby the large yellow one hanging in the sky, and the small white & red lights that seemed to travel all over erratically, unlike the blinking lights you see on the tail end of some small aircraft. the blinking lights traveled around in small circles, disappearing and reappearing all over the place, but in the same general location of the large yellow light. it seemed that the small lights were designed to distract ones attention away from the large yellow light.  eventually, the large yellow light that was star like moved toward where i was watching it on my porch and the hung itself above and in back of a tree out in front of my building, but i watched it park itself through the branches of the tree, right in between the branches of the tree. i went inside to get my iphon 4, and when i went outside, i saw a craft that appeared to be round, in the dark, with no lights on it, travel low, across the back side of the parking lot across the street, and because it appeared to be really nearby, i tried to shoot video of it, but when i went back in the house to see what i had captured on my iphon video, it appeared that the video never happened. i went to call someone and noticed all of my phone numbers that were there earlier in the day, had been wiped out, and i had to recharge the phone, which was strange because it was charged all night long, and i really had not made even one call on it all day, or used it for any reason. i went outside on my porch with binoculars, around 8:00pm, to look for the object that i had tried to capture on video, and i saw more irregular small blinking white lights and when i looked through the binoculars there was a gold star like object that appeared red too, which was irregular in shape as it hovering above the church, near the college. i watched it for at least 4 mins while talking on the phone to a friend, who i had on speaker phone. suddenly, the craft that was hovering started to move and it moved toward me very, very slowly, but i continued to watch it through the binoculars and it took the shape of a boomerang, somewhat like a stealth, but not quite and one side of the craft had a red light on it, the other side had a green light and the center glowed yellow, it turned really smoothly, and flew around the corner of my building, i ran inside and opened the shade and shut the lights off and watched it through my binoculars, as it disappeared from my sight, because i did not want to put the window up, because it was freezing cold outside. i continued watching, where the craft had hovered for some time, and there were other blinking lights, and another craft that was unlit in the sky that i could see through my binoculars. it was really cold out, i watched it for a while longer absolutely fascinated, and then i decided to come in.  because i have seen, so, much ufo activity in the sky from my home, from december, until now, in february, i feel that it is definitely time to say something. i cannot be the only person seeing these lights materializing into air craft. i do not have any photos of what i saw this evening, but i do have photos of the same type of light object that i saw this morning around 5:30am, but that photo is not related to tonight's occurrence which was absolutely incredible.  i could not believe my eyes, but i do believe it!
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Blinking lights all over in sky then a star like object that is hovering in sky moves and blinking lights eventually follow. then an unlit ball like object moves overhead about 150ft above then a star appears over above church which eventually took shape

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: Was driving west toward kansas city from louisville with my fianc, around dusk nearing st. louis.  we saw a few moving lights and unordinary shapes near the setting sun that appeared to be very far away. they were all hard to see and hard to differentiate from other more stationary objects, as it got darker we tried to keep an eye on them and they would move and disappear and re appear in a different location. we stopped for gas outside of the city and continued watching the objects, at dusk the lights started becoming more defined and irregular. they would become very bright and then completely dark.  at one point the light stopped and i was able to make out a dark object against the sunset.  then multiple lights came back on blinking in very irregular ways and moving around  each other at what appeared to be very fast speeds. as it became dark and we entered the city they disappeared
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Lights fluctuating in intensity and color at times unnaturally bright. danced around each other and moved seemingly very fast. then disappeared

content.detailedDescription: It was a little after 7 pm and i was outside walking my dog. i live on a mountain and have a very clear view of the sky. i often see airplanes but what i saw was nothing close to an airplane. as my dog walked around the yard, i looked to the sky. i saw what appeared to be a very bright star. it was brighter than any star i'd ever seen. as i continued to look at it, it grew in size and shape. it went from a round shape of a normal star, to a large oval shape. it had an aura around it. almost like a fog. it moved slowly from my left to my right. as it sped up the shape got flat. so much so that during the last few seconds it was totally flat. after around 2 and a half minutes it just vanished. i was in total shock. just after i lost sight of it, my dog started barking at seemingly nothing. i stayed outside for another 5 minutes or so and saw nothing after that.
content.summary: Bright light that grew in shape and size. moved slowly at first. then sped up before disappearing

content.detailedDescription: Witness was on a camping trip as a young man (currently 58 years old) in southern ohio with two buddies. noticed a bluish gray light in the sky like the light of an aircraft way out there on the horizon, except that it moved faster. the object then turned into a disc shape as it got closer and shot across the sky one way. then turned and shot back the other way across the sky ten or twelve times. the craft would have been covering hundreds of miles per second before shooting off at tremendous speed into outer space. witness is credible. (jch)
content.summary: Silver bluish ball of light that changed into a disc shape and shot off into outer space

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting out side on a patio eating lunch. then i looked up and saw a plane and next to it was a circle that was white about 300 feet next to it. then it took a rapid turn fast and disappeared.
content.summary: I was sitting out side on a patio eating lunch. then i looked up and saw a plane and next to it was a circle that was white about 300 feet next to it. then it took a rapid turn fast and disappeared.

content.detailedDescription:
The objects were too far to observe their detailed shape and size.
at that distance of (500 ft) in the sky they appeared like stars but they were no stars.
i noticed the first object making a straight path at a great speed then it blinked and vanished (there were no clouds in the sky and it was just dark - 7 pm)
the second object appeared with a greater flash light 20 mins after - just when i were going home after some shopping. it was making a straight path as the first one and it blinked before vanishing.
they both were no meteors nor satellites nor airplanes...They just were ufos.
both the sightings longed for no more then 7 secs.
content.summary: Two star like objects; they both blinked before disappearing; no stars; no satellites; no meteors
